page.title: 10THE BACON FACTORY
page.content: Just over the road from the school is the Bacon Factory. In 1957 the Bacon Factory was first opened it has been going for 28 years. 10 people work there and they work 8 hours a day. They work from 7:00-4:00. They have three lorries.The meat comes from Denmark and it goes to North Yorkshire, Lancashire, Derbyshire, and Teeside. They have warehousemen, representatives and clerical workers. The factory will still be open in ten or fifteen years. The meat comes in big carcasses and is sliced up and put into packets for the shops and supermarkets.
